title: Magnetic force between wires as distance changes

content.description:
The following questions are related to this scenario:

Two long, straight, parallel wires are held fixed, as shown above. A voltage is applied to wire X, creating a current IX to the right, and the wire experiences a magnetic force of magnitude FB toward wire Y.
content.question: If the distance between the two wires is tripled, what is the magnitude of the new magnetic force exerted on wire X?

topic.text: 12.3: Magnetic Fields of Current-Carrying Wires and the Biot-Savart Law

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
